definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

pinyin: yuan2 he2 xi4 bao1 xing2 wei1 sheng1 wu4

sentences.english: Thalli concentration is a key quality index in microbial growth process.
sentences.chinese: 菌体浓度是微生物生长过程中关键的质量指标。

sentences.english: Objective To verify the specificity and validity of the microbial limit tests of glycyrrhetinic acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立适合于甘草酸的微生物限度检查方法。

sentences.english: Microorganism in the air gone into the lake affected water quality of it.
sentences.chinese: 空气中的微生物进入水体影响衡水湖的水质。

sentences.english: Probiotics contain live micro-organisms, so-called good bacteria that colonize the intestine.
sentences.chinese: 益生菌含有活力微生物，可以在肠道内存活繁殖。

sentences.english: Objective To study the microbicidal effect of hyperoxidation ion water.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究强氧化离子水对微生物的杀灭效果。

sentences.english: There are reports of microbes surviving for much longer in a kind of suspended animation.
sentences.chinese: 还有报道称有的微生物在某种假死状态下活得更久。

sentences.english: The microbial degradation of BHC was remarkably influenced by the soluble oxygen in flooded soil.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为含水量影响了微生物呼吸活性所致。

sentences.english: The microbiome is also proving critical in many aspects of health.
sentences.chinese: 微生物组也在健康的其他方面被证实为是极其重要的。

sentences.english: Aim To establish a method for microbial limit tests of compound Huaimi capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立复方槐米胶囊微生物限度检查方法。

sentences.english: After the tillering stage the biomass 15N tended towards stable.
sentences.chinese: 在分蘖期以后微生物固持态15N的变化趋于稳定。

sentences.english: Now microbes are appearing far outside their environmental niches.
sentences.chinese: 现在微生物远远超出了它们的栖身环境。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a microbial inoculum and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种微生物菌剂及其制备方法。

sentences.english: The SOUR activity of microorganism was related to organic concentration and loading factor.
sentences.chinese: 微生物的比耗氧率活性与底物浓度及负荷率有关。

sentences.english: Eng. ) To teach the basic technique and concept of soil microbiology.
sentences.chinese: 传授研究土壤微生物之技术及观念。

sentences.english: Nowadays extremophilic microbes are the hotspot in life science study.
sentences.chinese: 极端环境微生物是当今生命科学领域的研究热点。

sentences.english: Through high oil domestications, target bacteria were offered for immobilization.
sentences.chinese: 通过高含油量驯化，为固定化提供目标微生物。
